- UX WEB [port 5173] - API MIDDLEWARE [port 8080] - DB MYSQL [port 3306] - API GEMINI [port 3000]

[AWS] JDR-Generator : Test d'ajout de CI/CD via la configuration GitHub Actions et AWS Elastic Beanstalk
- CMD TERMINAL BUILD DOCKER IMAGES : cd C:\Users\fredericcoupez\IdeaProjects\JDR-Generator docker login cd api/ docker pull maven:3.8.5-openjdk-17 docker pull eclipse-temurin:17-jre-alpine docker build -t eli256/jdr-generator-api:latest . docker push eli256/jdr-generator-api:latest cd .. cd web/ docker build -t eli256/jdr-generator-web:latest . docker push eli256/jdr-generator-web:latest cd .. cd gemini/ docker build -t eli256/jdr-generator-gemini:latest . docker push eli256/jdr-generator-gemini:latest cd ..
- UX WEB [port 5173] - API MIDDLEWARE [port 8080] - DB MYSQL [port 3306] - API GEMINI [port 3000]

[AWS] JDR-Generator : Test d'ajout de CI/CD via la configuration GitHub Actions et AWS Elastic Beanstalk
- CMD TERMINAL BUILD AND START DOCKER IMAGES : clear docker-compose down docker volume rm workflows_mysql-data docker-compose up --build -d docker-compose ps docker-compose logs api-container
- UX WEB [port 5173] - API MIDDLEWARE [port 8080] - DB MYSQL [port 3306] - API GEMINI [port 3000]

[DOCKER] JDR-Generator : Imagen3 n'est plus disponible en Europe, on va passer sur Dall-E d'OpenAI... [TODO AWS] Test d'ajout de CI/CD via la configuration GitHub Actions et AWS Elastic Beanstalk
- CMD TERMINAL BUILD AND START DOCKER IMAGES : clear docker-compose down docker volume rm workflows_mysql-data docker-compose up --build -d
docker-compose build web-container docker-compose ps docker-compose logs api-container docker-compose exec api-container sh env exit docker build -t eli256/jdr-generator-api:latest .
docker-compose build gemini-container docker-compose up -d gemini-container docker-compose logs gemini-container
docker-compose build openai-container docker-compose up -d openai-container docker-compose logs openai-container
- UX WEB [port 5173] - API MIDDLEWARE [port 8080] - DB MYSQL [port 3306] - API GEMINI [port 3000]
